articles.author: Brittany Shammas
articles.title: Firefighters investigated for group photo outside a burning home - Washington Post
articles.description: Firefighters investigated for group photo outside a burning home Washington Post Photo of Detroit firefighters posing in front of burning house will be investigated, commissioner says CNN Detroit firefighters scorched for taking group photo in front of burnin…
articles.content:
Now, fire department officials are investigating, with Commissioner Eric Jones telling the Detroit News that the picture was inappropriate and unprofessional.
Ninety-nine percent of the men and women who go to a scene like that ... know what to do, he said, … [+2217 chars]

articles.author: Kareem Fahim
articles.title: Turkey's parliament authorizes troop deployment to Libya as proxy war escalates
articles.description: President Trump, in a phone call with Erdogan, said that "foreign interference is complicating the situation in Libya."
articles.content: Ankara said it sought the troop authorization after the Tripoli government asked for support and also to protect Turkish interests in Libya. But the move which deepened a standoff between Turkey and its rivals in the Middle East showed how easily regional feu… [+4173 chars]
